"""Planets
==========

   :members:
   :private-members:

   :members:
   :private-members:

   :members:
   :private-members:


"""



[docs]class Planet(object):
    """Represent a planet."""




[docs]class Earth(Planet):
    """Represent the Earth."""
    radius = 6000000



[docs]class Mars(Planet):
    """Represent Mars."""
